TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GeneratorPosition extends System.ValueType

Docs.summary: is used to describe the position of an item that is managed by .

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition> is used by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IItemContainerGenerator.StartAt%2A>.
## Examples The following example illustrates how to use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition> to start generating forward from the beginning of an item list.
[!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromBeginningCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generateforwardfrombeginningcode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromBeginningCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generateforwardfrombeginningcode)]
The following example illustrates how to use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition> to start generating backward from the end of an item list.
[!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateBackwardFromEndCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generatebackwardfromendcode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateBackwardFromEndCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generatebackwardfromendcode)]
The following example illustrates how to use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.GeneratorPosition> to start generating forward from the middle of an item list.
[!code-csharp[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromMiddleCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#generateforwardfrommiddlecode)] [!code-vb[GeneratorPositionSnippets#GenerateForwardFromMiddleCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GeneratorPositionSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#generateforwardfrommiddlecode)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 index, int32 offset) cil managed

Docs.param: An index that is relative to the generated (realized) items. -1 is a special value that refers to a fictitious item at the beginning or the end of the items list.

An offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item. An offset of 0 refers to the indexed element itself, an offset 1 refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of -1 refers to the previous item.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of with the specified index and offset.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the offset that is relative to the ungenerated (unrealized) items near the indexed item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks An offset of **0** refers to the indexed element itself, an offset **1** refers to the next ungenerated (unrealized) item, and an offset of **-1** refers to the previous item.
